verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is our peace.
Who has broken down every wall.
He is our peace, He is our peace. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Cast all your cares on Him, for He careth for you.
He is our peace.
He is our peace. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
El es mi paz, pues a roto todas mis cadenas
El es mi paz. El es mi paz (Repetir)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Hecho toda ansiedad sobre El, pues el cuida de mi.
El es mi paz.
El es mi paz. (Repetir)
